name: Candy Buckets
description:
Tutorial:

2 Buttons:

Left Click - Collect candies

Right Click - Switch the basket the candies go into

Gameplay:

Place the right candies into the right baskets by clicking over them. Once a basket hits 10 candies the candies are then added to your score. You have 60 seconds to collect as much score as possible, with the intensity of the game ramping up as the timer goes down. Now GO

---------------------------------------

My first Unity game (published) 😎. May or may not add updates like powerups and such, for now take this (which is 1000% not a copy of the sorting bombs minigame in New Super Mario Bros DS)
